words.def: the quality or state of the achromatic color of least lightness (bearing the least resemblance to white)
the posterior part of a human (or animal) body from the neck to the end of the spine
the state of needing something that is absent or unavailable
a metal cleat on the bottom front of a horseshoe to prevent slipping
the area on a billiard table behind the balkline
a compartment at the front of a motor vehicle or locomotive where driver sits
a workplace for the conduct of scientific research
resinlike substance secreted by certain lac insects
a white linen liturgical vestment with sleeves
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
